{# errorcheck #} {% raw _ %} // ERROR `cannot use _ as marker` {% raw if %} // ERROR `unexpected if, expecting identifier, string or %}` {% raw code code %} // ERROR `unexpected code, expecting string or %}` {% raw `code` code %} // ERROR `unexpected code, expecting %}` {% raw code %} {% end code %} {% end raw code %} // ERROR `unexpected code, expecting raw` // ERROR `cannot use raw in quoted attribute`
